text: “Kapena (wabwino) ndiamene adayambitsa zolengedwa, (ndipo) kenako adzazibweza, kapenanso amene amakupatsani rizq (chakudya) kuchokera kumwamba ndi m’nthaka? Kodi pamodzi ndi Allah pali mulungu winanso? Nena: “Bweretsani umboni wanu ngati mukunena zoona (wotsimikizira kuti Allah ali ndi mnzake).”
